message.raw:
Have the progress bar treat (-1, -1, -1) as implying that no colour was set
for a marker. If (0, 0, 0) is encountered, actually treat it as black, unless
the dtype of the colour array implies the shot was compiled with a version
of labscript from before this distinction was made, in which case treat
(0, 0, 0) as implying the colour was not set, as before. As such this change is
backward compatible.

message:
